meanings.def: next to or at the side of somebody/something
examples: Nick caught up with me and rode alongside.

meanings.def: next to or at the side of something
examples: A police car pulled up alongside us.
a lifeboat moored alongside the yacht
Much of the land alongside the river is below sea level.

meanings.def: together with or at the same time as something/somebody
examples: Traditional beliefs still flourish alongside a modern urban lifestyle.
